titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Finance.

action.text: Committee on Finance. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Baucus. Without written report.

reference.label: text of measure as reported in Senate

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules and Administration.

bill.summary: 2/27/2013--Reported to Senate without amendment. Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Finance from March 1, 2013, through September 30, 2013.
